parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks whether position is inside given polygon

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> position '''inPolygon''' polygon
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format [[Position3D]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> polygon: [[Array]] - array of [[Position3D]] positions in format: [position1, position2...., positionN]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isInside = [100,100,0] [[inPolygon]] [[0,0,0],[1000,1000,0],[1000,0,0]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[in]], [[inArea]], [[drawPolygon]]
</value></part></template></root>
